update sm_receipt_body
receipt_head_id = #{receiptHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
receipt_no = #{receiptNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
material_no = #{materialNo,jdbcType=CHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from sm_receipt_body rb left join sm_receipt_head rh on rb.receipt_head_id = rh.receipt_head_id where rb.dr = 1

insert into sm_receipt_body (receipt_body_id, receipt_head_id, receipt_no, material_no, material_type, material_desc, order_total, accept_num, accept_date, good_num, bad_num, stock_num, `status`, dr) values
(#{po.receiptBodyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.receiptHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.receiptNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.materialNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.materialType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{po.materialDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.orderTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.acceptNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.acceptDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{po.goodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.badNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.stockNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{po.dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select:
select
from sm_receipt_body where receipt_no like #{no,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' order by receipt_body_id desc limit 1
